SDR.CombatExperience: Weapon Skills may be developed by practice/training as normal, but no weapon skill can be increased beyond ML70 except by actual combat experience (SKILLS 18)
SDR.InitiativeExperience: Once opened, Development Rolls are made only for Combat Experience (SKILLS 18)
SDR.SkillSpecialty: Characters may begin selecting specialties when a skill reaches ML 40 (SKILLS 2)
